content: dice bag gemstones bag trinkets bag whatever you call it and whatever you re carrying around in it this adorable small drawstring pouch is the perfect size this little pouch crochet pattern would be great used as a dice bag for game nights materials comfy fingering size 1/fingering wight cotton -approx 110 yards as written incl drawstring crochet hook in size 2mm if you want to add beads to yours there is a tutorial included for that as well as changing the size of the finished bag
